Tenant.title: Tenant
Tenant.description: Represents a cafe (tenant) in the AirCafe application.

logoUrl.description: URL of the cafe's logo. Can be completed by the cafe admin later.

qrisImageUrl.description: URL of the cafe's QRIS image for payments. Can be completed by the cafe admin later.

tokenHarian.description: The daily verification token for anti-spam.

address.description: The physical address of the cafe.

ownerName.description: The name of the cafe owner.

phoneNumber.description: The contact phone number for the cafe.

receiptMessage.description: A custom message to be printed on customer receipts.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the AirCafe application (admin or superadmin). The document ID for this entity is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

authUid.description: Firebase Auth UID for the user. This is the same as the document ID.

tenantId.description: Reference to Tenant. (Relationship: Tenant 1:N User). The ID of the tenant this user belongs to (if applicable). Null for superadmin.

Menu.title: Menu
Menu.description: Represents a menu item offered by a cafe.

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item.

name.description: The name of the menu item.

description.description: A description of the menu item.

imageUrl.description: URL of the menu item's image.

price.description: The price of the menu item.

category.description: The category name of the menu item.

available.description: Indicates if the menu item is currently available.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of menu items.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a customer.

orderItems.description: List of items included in the order.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order.

uniqueCode.description: A 3-digit unique code added to the total for QRIS payments.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used for the order (e.g., 'cash', 'qris').

paymentVerified.description: Indicates if the payment has been verified.

verificationToken.description: Verification token provided by customer to avoid spam orders.

Table.title: Table
Table.description: Represents a table in a cafe.

params.description: The unique identifier for the tenant.

params.name: userId

params.name: tenantId

params.name: categoryId
params.description: The unique identifier for the category.

params.name: tenantId

params.name: tableId
params.description: The unique identifier for the table.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore data structure is designed to support a multi-tenant SaaS application (AirCafe) with distinct roles (superadmin, admin_kafe, and anonymous customer). It prioritizes authorization independence by denormalizing tenant-specific data and access control information where needed. The structure also ensures clear segregation of data based on tenant and role, simplifying security rules. Path-based ownership is used where appropriate to secure user-owned data.

Authorization Independence (Denormalization):
*   The `User` document stores the `tenantId`.  This is essential for admins, linking them directly to a specific tenant. The `Order` documents store `tenantId`, `tableId` and `verificationToken`.
*   The `Menu`, `Category`, and `Table` documents also contain `tenantId`, ensuring that all data related to a tenant is easily accessible and securable.
*   Token verification for creating orders is enforced by comparing `request.resource.data.verificationToken` with `get(/databases/(default)/documents/tenants/$(request.resource.data.tenantId)).data.tokenHarian`.

QAPs (Query Assurance Patterns):
*   Secure List Operations:  The structure facilitates secure list operations by segregating data based on tenant ID.  Rules can easily filter based on the `tenantId` of the requesting user (for admin_kafe) or based on the requested `tenantId` for public reads.
*   The admin role can only read and write data within their assigned tenant's subcollections, ensuring data isolation.
